price: 115. Firqawni Baababa :Muusaw atu isi caxxa naharat Qidee kee hinnay nanu naharat Qida mara nakkem tiya kaak iyyen.
arabic: قَالُواْ يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِمَّآ أَن تُلۡقِيَ وَإِمَّآ أَن نَّكُونَ نَحۡنُ ٱلۡمُلۡقِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū yāmūsā immā an tul'qiya wa-immā an nakūna naḥnu al-mul'qīna
